stories.text:
Hi,

I'm a mid career technologist, and was thinking of picking up a coursera plus sub this year. I'm looking for good technical courses that will put some updated credentials on my cv. I am an autodidact (always learning new stuff anyways .. point of the coursera sub is mainly to help the CV). I do have a PhD in CS from 15 years ago from a top-20 school.

There was a specialization in Math for DL/ML that I'm quite sure I'd like to do. Am generally interested in getting some creds around ML/Datascience, Natural Language, Computer vision, other related AI things. Suggestions welcome!
stories.title: Ask HN: Good courses/specializations on coursera plus?
